title: #418: Talking with Cristina and Kyle from 'Summer House'
description:
"Summer House" never got a reunion on Bravo; so we're here to help. Come listen to cast members Kyle Cooke and Cristina Gibson hash out all the drama from the summer (including their very own fight in the season finale). We talk about how the show came about, what went down in the house, and where everyone stands nowadays. We love "Summer House," and we hope this episode scratches that reunion itch!

See acast.com/privacy for privacy and opt-out information.

Our Patreon Extras: https://patreon.com/watchwhatcrappens
author: watchwhatcrappens@gmail.com (Ben Mandelker & Ronnie Karam)
